name: Summuh
description:
A Puzzle Platformer set in a fantasy world. The Player controls a magical being with the powers to breakdown and repair elements of their environment. The Player must assist the inhabitants of the game by retrieving their lost idols, but at what cost?

Controls: 

Joystick / WSAD: Movement.

A / Space: Jump.

X / Right Click: Break Down.

Y / Left Click: Repair.

_______________________________________________

Created over 48hours during Global Game Jam 2020.

Programming: Jack Hookham, Trent Davies.

Design:  Flint, Adam James, Vincent Garcia.

Art: Adam James, Rival Brear, Flint.

VFX: Vincent Garcia.

Sound: Simon James.
